body_html:
@garibarba I'm glad you discovered tf.GPUOptions, and thanks for filing an issue!

Here's documentation on why TensorFlow allocates all GPU memory up-front, by default, and other GPU-related information:
https://www.tensorflow.org/tutorials/using_gpu#allowing_gpu_memory_growth

So basically this is working-as-intended. Closing this out.
